oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Adair. Tombstones of John Adair and Edward Smith, 1926.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Unveiling tombstones of Revolutionary War soldiers John Adair and Edward Smith (right) by the Bonny Kate Chapter of the Daughters of the American Revolution. Left-right: Sarah Smith Sanders, J. Harvey Smith, Mary Boyce Temple, Sarah Smith McCampbell. October 26, 1926. Lynnhurst Cemetery.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Rites & ceremonies; Tombs & sepulchral monuments; Events; Flags; Organizations; Cemeteries;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Knox County Two Centuries Photograph Project
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number and provide a brief description of the photograph.
